title: spam someone
description: spams someone with the text you give it for the amount of messages

title: random cat
command: type cat, pussy, poekie or miauw
description: sends a picture of a random cat from random.cat

title: delete messages
description: deletes all the messages from this chat

title: create channel
description: creates a channel with the given name

title: play music
description: creates a channel music channel if you haven't got one already and plays the song from the given url

title: stop
description: stops the music that's being played

title: delete chat bot history
description: deletes the chat bot's history from your conversation

title: statistics
description: gets your user status, you gain xp by typing

title: set minimum lvl of a role
description: sets the min_lvl of a role, you need to be **admin** for this

title: set lvl multiplier of the server/guild
description: sets the lvl multiplier of the server lower easier higher harder default = 1, you need to be **admin** for this

title: add bot to server/guild
description: gives invite link to invite bot to servers/guilds
